components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Inbound SMS Delivery Delays to a Subset of Chile Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing inbound SMS delivery delays when sending messages to a subset of Chile Phone Numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting an emergency maintenance from 21 January 2023 at 13:00 PST until 22 January 2023 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Austria, Indonesia, Italy, UK
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Lookup SIM Swap - 3 Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Identity Match - Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK

affected_components.name: ACCOUNT SECURITY - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - U.S. Cellular

incident_updates.body: The U.S. Cellular network in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 21 January 2023 at 20:30 PST until 22 January 2023 at 06:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from U.S. Cellular US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 January 2023 at 21:00 PST until 23 January at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from Twilio.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are announcing a maintenance window for the Super SIM Data Insights product from 23rd of January at 5:00 am PDT and 23rd of January at 6:00 am PDT. During this time the results returned from the Super SIM/UsageRecords API and Super SIM data usage reported in Console may experience delays reflecting new usage for up to 1 hour.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 23 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Arab Emirates SMS Carrier Maintenance - Etisalat

incident_updates.body: The Etisalat network in United Arab Emirates is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 23 January 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United Arab Emirates handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 23 January 2023 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Bouygues Telecom handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 24 January 2023 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 01:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries below via a subset of longcodes.

Belgium
Guam
Cuba
Austria

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Telcel network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 19:50 PST until 25 January 2023 at 20:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Telcel Mexico handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 January 2023 at 10:00 PST until 26 January 2023 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Vodafone network in Egypt is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 January 2023 at 15:00 PST until 26 January 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vodafone Egypt handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our SMS/MMS carrier partner in US is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2023 at 22:00 PST until 29 January 2023 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS/MMS to and from US handsets via a subset of US Longcode and US Shortcode.

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 February 2023 at 14:30 PST until 01 February 2023 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 February 2023 at 16:00 PST until 01 February 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

09 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 09 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
11 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 11 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
16 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
18 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 18 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
